homeSection.subTitle: Services
homeSection.title: High-quality dental care for the whole family
homeSection.description: At Clínica Dental Viapark, we combine modern technology with a personal approach to offer everything from general checkups to implants, aesthetics, orthodontics, and emergency care -- tailored to both children and adults.

page.subTitle: Our Services
page.title: High-quality dental care for the whole family
page.description: At Clínica Dental Viapark, we combine modern technology with a personal approach to offer everything from general checkups to implants, aesthetics, orthodontics, and emergency care--tailored to both children and adults.

general.title: General Dentistry
general.description: Prevention and maintenance: regular checkups, professional cleanings, fillings, and overall care to keep your oral health in top shape.

pediatric.title: Pediatric & Youth Dentistry
pediatric.description: Friendly care for our youngest patients: preventive care (fluoride, fillings), explanations at their level, and brushing lessons to avoid cavities.

implant.title: Implantology
implant.description: Permanent solutions for missing teeth: Dr. Nasre places durable, natural-looking implants as long-term tooth replacements.

aesthetic.title: Aesthetic Dentistry
aesthetic.description: Cosmetic treatments to make your smile shine: professional whitening, veneers, or composite build-up for an improved aesthetic result.

reconstructive.title: Reconstructive Dentistry
reconstructive.description: Restoration of complex dental damage: functional and aesthetic rehabilitation for wear, trauma, or multiple missing teeth.

orthodontics.title: Orthodontics & Aligners
orthodontics.description: Straight teeth for kids and adults: traditional braces or nearly invisible Invisalign aligners for comfortable, discreet alignment.

surgical.title: Oral Surgery
surgical.description: Minor surgical procedures: wisdom tooth removal, small jaw interventions, and treatment of dental infections.

emergency.title: Emergency Dentistry
emergency.description: Same-day urgent care for pain, swelling or accidents: call us immediately--our goal is to help you on the very same day.

emergency.subTitle: Emergency Dentistry
emergency.title: Same-day urgent care for pain, swelling or accidents
emergency.description: At Clínica Dental Viapark, we understand that dental emergencies can happen anytime. Call us at +34 641 328 992 for immediate assistance--we strive to see you on the very same day.

features.subTitle: Our Strengths
features.title: Modern dentistry with a personal approach
features.description: At Clínica Dental Viapark, we combine advanced techniques, a calm environment, and personalized care--so every patient leaves with a healthy, pain-free smile.

personalized.title: Personalized Care
personalized.description: Dr. Nasre treats each patient with a calm, clear approach--perfect for those with dental anxiety.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Team
multilingual.description: Our staff speaks Dutch, German, and English, ensuring clear communication and comfort.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Family Dentistry
comprehensive.description: From children to seniors, we cover everything--general checkups, pediatric, implants, and more.

modern.title: Modern Techniques & Comfort
modern.description: We use the latest equipment and a gentle environment to prioritize your quality of care.
